sp_css.name: scm_reference

sys_update_version.name: sp_css_f62bcdf893bbaa10e393f6fa3d03d63d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_css"><sp_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css>/* 
 * scmReferenceV2 Styles
 * Mimics sdx-select appearance but with custom functionality
 */

.scm-select-wrapper {
  width: 100%;
  position: relative;
}

/* Label styles matching sdx-select */
.scm-select-label {
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.2;
}

/* Main component container */
.scm-select-component {
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  outline: none;
}

/* Header wrapper (like sdx-select) */
.scm-select-header-wrapper {
  overflow: hidden;
  color: #666;
  border-radius: 4px;
  transition: all 200ms ease;
  position: relative;
}

/* Header styles */
.scm-select-header {
  position: relative;
  background: #fff;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-radius: 4px;
  min-height: 44px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 200ms ease;
}

/* Hover state */
.scm-select-component:not(.scm-select-disabled) .scm-select-header:hover {
  border-color: #0073e6;
}

/* Open state */
.scm-select-component.scm-select-open .scm-select-header-wrapper {
  box-shadow: 0 0 4px 0 rgba(102, 102, 102, 0.1);
  border-bottom-left-radius: 0;
  border-bottom-right-radius: 0;
}

.scm-select-component.scm-select-open .scm-select-header {
  border-bottom-left-radius: 0;
  border-bottom-right-radius: 0;
  border-bottom-color: transparent;
}

/* Selection, placeholder, and input styles */
.scm-select-selection,
.scm-select-placeholder,
.scm-select-input {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1.2;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  background: transparent;
  color: #333;
}

.scm-select-placeholder {
  color: #999;
}

.scm-select-input {
  width: 100%;
}

.scm-select-input::placeholder {
  color: #999;
}

/* Thumb (arrow/spinner area) */
.scm-select-thumb {
  width: 44px;
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  pointer-events: none;
  transition: all 200ms ease;
}

/* Arrow icon rotation when open */
.scm-select-component.scm-select-open .scm-select-thumb sdx-icon {
  transform: rotate(180deg);
}

/* Dropdown list */
.scm-select-list {
  position: absolute;
  top: 100%;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  background: #fff;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-top: none;
  border-radius: 0 0 4px 4px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  max-height: 300px;
  overflow-y: auto;
}

/* Options container */
.scm-select-options {
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

/* Individual option styles */
.scm-select-option {
  padding: 12px 16px;
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1.2;
  color: #333;
  cursor: pointer;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #f0f0f0;
  transition: background-color 150ms ease;
  user-select: none;
}

.scm-select-option:last-child {
  border-bottom: none;
}

/* Option hover state */
.scm-select-option:hover,
.scm-select-option.scm-select-option-hover {
  background-color: #f5f5f5;
}

/* Selected option state */
.scm-select-option.scm-select-option-selected {
  background-color: #e6f3ff;
  color: #0073e6;
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* Load more option */
.scm-select-load-more {
  font-style: italic;
  color: #666;
  background-color: #f9f9f9;
}

.scm-select-load-more:hover {
  background-color: #f0f0f0;
}

/* No results option */
.scm-select-no-results,
.scm-select-loading-option {
  color: #999;
  font-style: italic;
  cursor: default;
  background-color: #f9f9f9;
}

.scm-select-no-results:hover,
.scm-select-loading-option:hover {
  background-color: #f9f9f9;
}

/* Disabled state */
.scm-select-component.scm-select-disabled {
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

.scm-select-component.scm-select-disabled .scm-select-label {
  color: #999;
}

.scm-select-component.scm-select-disabled .scm-select-header {
  background-color: #f5f5f5;
  border-color: #ddd;
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

.scm-select-component.scm-select-disabled .scm-select-selection,
.scm-select-component.scm-select-disabled .scm-select-placeholder {
  color: #999;
}

.scm-select-component.scm-select-disabled .scm-select-thumb sdx-icon {
  opacity: 0.5;
}

/* Loading state */
.scm-select-component.scm-select-loading .scm-select-header {
  cursor: wait;
}

/* Has value state */
.scm-select-component.scm-select-has-value .scm-select-selection {
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* Focus state for input */
.scm-select-input:focus {
  outline: none;
}

.scm-select-component.scm-select-open .scm-select-header {
  border-color: #0073e6;
}

/* Responsive adjustments */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .scm-select-list {
    max-height: 250px;
  }
  
  .scm-select-option {
    padding: 14px 16px;
    font-size: 16px; /* Prevents zoom on mobile */
  }
}

/* Dark theme support (if needed) */
.scm-select-wrapper.scm-dark-theme {
  .scm-select-label {
    color: #f0f0f0;
  }
  
  .scm-select-header {
    background: #2a2a2a;
    border-color: #555;
    color: #f0f0f0;
  }
  
  .scm-select-selection,
  .scm-select-input {
    color: #f0f0f0;
  }
  
  .scm-select-placeholder {
    color: #aaa;
  }
  
  .scm-select-list {
    background: #2a2a2a;
    border-color: #555;
  }
  
  .scm-select-option {
    color: #f0f0f0;
    border-bottom-color: #444;
  }
  
  .scm-select-option:hover,
  .scm-select-option.scm-select-option-hover {
    background-color: #333;
  }
  
  .scm-select-option.scm-select-option-selected {
    background-color: #1a4d7a;
    color: #87ceeb;
  }
}
</css><name>scm_reference</name><sys_class_name>sp_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-02 20:09:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>f62bcdf893bbaa10e393f6fa3d03d63d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>scm_reference</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SCM" source="x_680259_scm">9b70ffe7836a2650efda54b6feaad334</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SCM">9b70ffe7836a2650efda54b6feaad334</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_css_f62bcdf893bbaa10e393f6fa3d03d63d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-02 20:10:12</sys_updated_on><turn_off_scss_compilation>false</turn_off_scss_compilation></sp_css></record_update>
